column4: Ubuntu Netbook Remix 9.10: PROBLEM: when booting from USB stick (the iso is good and setup correctly on USB), i can boot from stick and it works, but commands dont work right like sudo or su just throws SQUASHFS errors. Im trying to install to harddrive, when i boot and select install to harddrive it goes through startup, then quits the ubuntu GUI, goes to a command line, and throws more SQUASHFS errors.
what about Bus error (core dumped) in UNR? anyone
just curious, how do you create the bootable usb?
i guess if you can boot unr and using it as live session there's an Install icon on desktop.
